title: Bokura No Melancholy
alternative_title: ぼくらの片恋メランコリー,Bokura no Katakoi Melancholy
status: ぼくらの片恋メランコリー,Bokura no Katakoi Melancholy
description:
Description :
        Kanei Tomoya came back to his previous high school to be a substitute teacher in Physical Education. He met his fellow teachers on his first day and everything is sailing smoothly until Seta Kousuke came, his arts teacher back in high school. Everything became worse when he accidentally broke Seta-sensei's phone and was asked to be his lover in the span of his four months stay. Now will this "relationship" turn into something good or something bad?
